name: donatetrack
description: A comprehensive donation tracking and management platform connecting donors with verified NGOs across India

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:admin
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:admin
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp admin/.env.example admin/.env
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
